ozpIwc.api.intents.FSM Class

Uses
  • ozpIwc.util.Event
Defined in: src\js\bus\api\services\intents\fsm.js:12
Module: ozpIwc.api.intents
Parent Module: ozpIwc.api

A Finite State Machine for in-flight intent resources. This state machine is static and manipulates the apiNodes it receives given the packet context received.

  • Index
  • Methods
  • Properties

Item Index

Methods

  • choosing
  • complete
  • delivering
  • error
  • init
  • mixinOnOff
  • off
  • on
  • running
  • stateReturn
  • transition

Properties

  • events
  • states
  • stateTransitions

Methods

choosing

() ozpIwc.api.base.Node

Defined in src\js\bus\api\services\intents\fsm.js:146

The choosing state. The node is in a choosing state when: (1) the intent chooser is opened. (2) the api is gathering the preference-stored designated handler.

The node will transition to delivering once the handler has been chosen.

Returns:

ozpIwc.api.base.Node:

complete

(
  • entity
)
ozpIwc.api.base.Node

Defined in src\js\bus\api\services\intents\fsm.js:163

The Complete state. Once the intent has been handled or canceled the node will transition to the complete state. From here the API will mark the node for deletion as it is no longer needed.

Parameters:

  • entity Object

    The entity of the request packet received by the Api.

Returns:

ozpIwc.api.base.Node:

delivering

(
  • entity
)
ozpIwc.api.base.Node

Defined in src\js\bus\api\services\intents\fsm.js:106

The delivering state. The node is in a delivering state when it's registered handler is called to operate on the intent data. The register handler will respond with "running" to signify it has received the request.

Parameters:

  • entity Object

    The entity of the request packet received by the Api.

Returns:

ozpIwc.api.base.Node:

error

(
  • entity
)
ozpIwc.api.base.Node

Defined in src\js\bus\api\services\intents\fsm.js:85

The error handling state. This state is called when unexpected state changes and missing data occurs in the state machine.

Parameters:

  • entity Object

    The entity of the request packet received by the Api.

Returns:

ozpIwc.api.base.Node:

init

() Object

Defined in src\js\bus\api\services\intents\fsm.js:40

The initial state. This state immediately determines the next state of the node based on the number of handler choices it contains.

Returns:

Object:

(
  • eventName
  • event
)
Object

Inherited from ozpIwc.util.Event: src\js\common\events\event.js:64

Fires an event that will be received by all handlers.

Parameters:

    Name of the event.

  • event Object

    Event object to pass to the handlers.

Returns:

Object:

The event after all handlers have processed it.

(
  • target
)

Inherited from ozpIwc.util.Event: src\js\common\events\event.js:87

Adds an {{#crossLink "ozpIwc.util.Event/off:method"}}on(){{/crossLink}} and {{#crossLink "ozpIwc.util.Event/off:method"}}off(){{/crossLink}} function to the target that delegate to this object.

    Target to receive the on/off functions

(

)

Inherited from ozpIwc.util.Event: src\js\common\events\event.js:51

Unregisters an event handler previously registered.

  • callback Function

on

(
  • event
  • callback
  • [self]
)
Object

Inherited from ozpIwc.util.Event: src\js\common\events\event.js:27

Registers a handler for the the event.

Parameters:

  • event String

    The name of the event to trigger on.

  • callback Function

    Function to be invoked.

  • [self] Object optional

    Used as the this pointer when callback is invoked.

Returns:

Object:

A handle that can be used to unregister the callback via off

running

(
  • entity
)
ozpIwc.api.base.Node

Defined in src\js\bus\api\services\intents\fsm.js:125

The running state. The node is in a running state when the registered handler has received the request data. The node will transition to the "complete" state upon receiving a response from the handler's operation.

Parameters:

  • entity Object

    The entity of the request packet received by the Api.

Returns:

ozpIwc.api.base.Node:

(

ozpIwc.api.base.Node

Triggers node's state event and returns the node.

  • node Object

ozpIwc.api.base.Node:

transition

(
  • node
  • [packet]
)
ozpIwc.api.base.Node

Defined in src\js\bus\api\services\intents\fsm.js:215

The transition utility function. This determines if the requested state change from the packet is valid, then calls the state transition and returns the modified node for storage.

Parameters:

  • node ozpIwc.api.base.Node
  • [packet] ozpIwc.PacketContext optional

    If not provided, FSM assumes initial state transition.

Returns:

ozpIwc.api.base.Node:

Properties

events

Object

Inherited from ozpIwc.util.Event: src\js\common\events\event.js:18

A key value store of events.

Default: {}

states

Object

Defined in src\js\bus\api\services\intents\fsm.js:30

A collection of states in the FSM. Each state is a function that is called when a node transitions to it via ozpIwc.InFlightFSM.transition. Each state function is called with the node's scope.

stateTransitions

Object

Defined in src\js\bus\api\services\intents\fsm.js:183

A collection of state transitions for the Finite State machine. The first level of properties represent current state and the second level represents states that can be transitioned to.
